query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (string4) string4, two, ten FROM onek ORDER BY string4 using <, two using >, ten using <
expected: SELECT DISTINCT ON (string4) string4, two, ten FROM onek ORDER BY string4 USING <, two USING >, ten USING <

query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (string4, ten) string4, two, ten FROM onek ORDER BY string4 using <, two using <, ten using <
expected: SELECT DISTINCT ON (string4, ten) string4, two, ten FROM onek ORDER BY string4 USING <, two USING <, ten USING <

query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (string4, ten) string4, ten, two FROM onek ORDER BY string4 using <, ten using >, two using <
expected: SELECT DISTINCT ON (string4, ten) string4, ten, two FROM onek ORDER BY string4 USING <, ten USING >, two USING <

query: select distinct on (1) floor(random()) as r, f1 from int4_tbl order by 1,2
expected: SELECT DISTINCT ON (1) floor(random()) AS r, f1 FROM int4_tbl ORDER BY 1, 2

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four,two FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four, two FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1

query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four,two FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1
expected: SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four, two FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four,two FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1,2
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four, two FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1, 2

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four,hundred FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1,2
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT DISTINCT ON (four) four, hundred FROM tenk1 WHERE four = 0 ORDER BY 1, 2
